scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.install-deps: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.download-data: curl -o server/data/gaussian_splat_data.zip https://projects.markkellogg.org/downloads/gaussian_splat_data.zip && unzip -o server/data/gaussian_splat_data.zip -d server/data && rm server/data/gaussian_splat_data.zip
